titleStmt.title: The souls excellency or, A sweet meditation of the preciousnesse of the soul of man. A subject fit for every man and woman in the world, to fixe their best and choisest thoughts upon: who desire to begin heaven here, and to live with God in heaven for ever. By J.O.
titleStmt.author: J. O.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R.W. at the Star under Peters Church in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
